name: OVERDICE
description:
If shoot enemy with the same color as a dice top side, you will kill it instantaniusly and get dice back.  COMBO DICE KILLING!

We wasn't able to finish any level, but mechanics are there. Please try to kill all enemies on the level without breaking a combo.


WASD - to move
Space - to jump
RMB - to pick up the dice
LMB - to Throw the dice

Try killing enemies by matching colors on the cube and enemy. Using it - you can do a cool combos.
